GameModifier.Provides: Unit cannot be Charmed (from abilities such as Tame and Silvertongue)

Cannot be knocked Prone, +1 Moves.
Gorgons cannot equip any Mounts. They can equip boots and leggings (no graphics shown).
Gorgons count as: Monster Beast Male
Rush- Unit takes an extra action
+1 Moves
+1 Moves
Unit cannot be Charmed (from abilities such as Tame or Silvertongue)

At the start of combat, Angels are boosted, for free, according to the number of shards of various types controlled. Different shard types add different effects: Air Shard = +1 Dodge per Earth Shard = +0.5 Defense per Fire Shard = +1 Initiative per Water Shard = +1 Spell Mastery per Life Shard = +1 Spell resistance +1 Move if faction controls at least 3 Life shards
Angels may not ride any mounts. Angel Champions always fulfill the "special circumstance" requirement to lift a Hex and therefore can always lift a Hex at level-up if they suffer one.
Angels count as: Celestial Humanoid Different Genders
Rush- Unit takes an extra action
+1 Moves

Cannot be knocked Prone, +1 Moves.
Centaurs count as: Monster Beast Male
Centaurs cannot equip any Mounts. They can equip boots and leggings (no graphics shown).
Soul Spark- Does 2 (+1 per level) lightning damage to the victim
+1 Moves
+15% damage when using the Impale ability
+1 Moves
+15% damage when using the Impale ability

Chaos Legion units receives two random buffs at the start of combat from the following list: +10 Dodge, +10 Accuracy, +33 physical resistance, Unit is healed for half missing health, +0.5 Tactical Health regeneration per level, +10 Defense when Auto-defending, +1 Moves, Unit gains Poison attack equal to its level, Unit gains Lightning attack equal to half its level, Unit suffers -10 Spell resistance, Unit suffers -3 Initiative. If the same effect is chosen twice, it will only be applied once.
Chaos Legion counts as: Demon Humanoid Different Genders* *Males have red necklaces, females don't
Berserk- +2 to Attack and Initiative but the unit attacks enemies without the player's direction. Berserk units never cast spells.

Cannot be knocked Prone. +3 Poison attack. If faction controls 3 or more Air shards, unit gains +1 Moves in tactical combat.
Drota cannot equip any Mounts. They can equip boots and leggings (no graphics shown).
Drota counts as: Twisted Monster Different Genders* *Males carry bone necklaces and masks, females don't
Rush- Unit takes an extra action
+1 Moves

Direct magical attack used by elves is increased by 20% for Fire, Cold, Lightning and Arcane attack.
Elves count as: Immortal Humanoid Different Genders .
Soul Spark- Does 2 (+1 per level) lightning damage to the victim

+50 Cold resistance, -25 Fire resistance.
Frost Giants deal Overpower damage against all grouped enemies. For every member in a unit above the second, a Frost Giant adds 50% damage to each attack.
When attempting to attack a Champion that has learned the Path of the Assassin or Path of the Warrior, the Frost Giant loses half of its Accuracy.
Frost Giants may only ride Icebeasts and Dire Bears (trained units, but not champions, count as Oversized when they do).
Frost Giants count as: Monster Hidden Genders (Oversized) (see above)
Guarded Strike- A defensive strike for half normal damage that leaves the attacker defending
+1 Moves
+1 Dodge per level

Can wear armor class one above their current limit (leather=chainmail, chainmail=plate).
Gnomes suffer -10 Resistance to physical attacks from all Oversized enemies, unless the Gnome also counts as Oversized.
Gnomes count as: Humanoid Different Genders
Fortify- Units in fortified tiles get +10 to Accuracy and +20 to Dodge

+10 Spell Resist. +10 Fire, Lightning, Cold and Poison resistance. All enchantments cast on Golems cost 50% more mana maintenance. Golems are Immune to Fear (fear is caused by certain high-level monsters).
For every 2 health point regained each strategic turn, golems regain another 1 health point.
Golems count as: Construct Not Alive Humanoid Genderless
Soul Spark- Does 2 (+1 per level) lightning damage to the victim

+2 Fire attack, +33 Fire resist, -25 Cold resist, -1 Initiative.
Living Stone count as: Humanoid Not Alive Hidden Genders
Flame Tongue- Does 2 fire damage per level to the victim

+0.25 Defense per level from natural armor, +20 Fire resistance and -20 Cold resistance
All Elementals hate the Lizardmen and therefore gain +30 Accuracy when attempting to attack them.
Lizardmen count as: Humanoid Different Genders
Flame Tongue- Does 2 fire damage per level to the victim

+15 Dodge against any Ranged attack. Shadows gain +10 Dodge against Beasts (unless Shadow counts as beast). -25 Lightning resistance. +1 Moves first turn in combat.
Shadows count as: Humanoid Genderless
Double Strike- Strike twice at -20 to Accuracy

+50 Poison resistance. -5 Fire, Cold and Lightning resistance. -25 Arcane resistance . Undead are Immune to Fear (fear is caused by certain high-level monsters). Undead gain +10 resistance to all physical attacks.
Undead count as: Humanoid Immortal Not Alive Genderless Undead
Wraith Touch- Drain 1 Hit Point per level from the victim unless they resist
This unit counts as Celestial

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Iron Golems are Immune to Fear (fear is caused by certain high-level monsters).
Iron Golems regain life in strategic mode twice as fast as normal. All enchantments cast on Golems cost 50% more mana maintenance. Iron Golems gain +30 Spell Resist and +25 Resistance to Fire, Cold and Poison Resist.
Iron Golems count as Genderless, Not Alive, Constructs and Monsters.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Wolfmen gain +1 Moves. Wolfmen gain +10 physical resistance from their fur.
Wolfmen fear fire and lose half of their Accuracy when trying to attack any target with a higher passive Fire attack.
Wolfmen are Male and count as Beasts and Humanoids.
